dcterms:description: The OGB OGBN-arXiv dataset consists of 169,343 Computer Science papers from arXiv, hand-labeled into 40 subject areas by paper authors and arXiv moderators, with 1,166,243 reference links. Default node features are constructed from textual information by averaging the embeddings of words in the articles’ titles and abstracts.
dcterms:title: OGBN-arXiv

dcterms:creator: Prithviraj Sen
Galileo Namata
Mustafa Bilgic
Lise Getoor
Brian Galligher
Tina Eliassi-Rad
dcterms:description: The PubMed diabetes dataset consists of 19,717 papers from the National Library of Medicine’s PubMed database labeled into one of three categories: 'Diabetes Mellitus, Experimental,' 'Diabetes Mellitus Type 1,' and 'Diabetes Mellitus Type 2,' with 44,338 references links. TF-IDF weighted word vectors from a dictionary of 500 unique words are provided as default node features.
dcterms:title: PubMed diabetes
